mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, aa.* from (select * from BOOK where B_TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or B_WRITER like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or B_PUBLISHER like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by B_SEQ desc) aa) where rnum>#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
